DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the effect of platelet infusion prior to transfer to a vascular surgical department in patients with a ruptured abdominal aortic aneurism.
DOC.brief_title: START - Early Thrombocyte Administration to Patients With Ruptured Abdominal Aortic Aneurism
DOC.criteria: diagnosed with rAAA either by clinical evaluation or CT or UL formerly randomized in the study aneurism not ruptured during operation
